name: accommodatingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone is eager or willing to help other people: She accommodatingly replied that she would be happy to help. He bent his head accommodatingly to hear her.
More examplesFewer examplesI asked him to teach me a formal Spanish greeting and, accommodatingly, he recorded a short speech for me to learn. He requested that all his personal papers be destroyed after his death and his wife accommodatingly did so.He accommodatingly cleared all his things off the bench to make room for her.
